io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Interface BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockLootProviderBase.LootModifier
    Enclosing class:
    BlockLootProviderBase
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier
extends BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory
    Interface to modify a standalone loot entry to a new loot entry. This can also be used as a BlockLootProviderBase.LootFactory in which case the default item entry obtained from BlockLootProviderBase.StandaloneLootFactory.item() is passed to the apply method.

    • Method Summary

      static BlockLootProviderBase.GenericLootModifier identity()
      Gets a loot modifier that does nothing.
